links.title: Apple admits to keyboard problems | LinkedIn
links.description: Apple found problems with its built-in "butterfly" mechanism in recent MacBook and MacBook Pro laptop keyboards and will offer customers a free extended warranty to fix the issues, TheVerge reports. The warranty lasts for four years from the time the laptops were purchased and will cover replacement of any number of keys or the entire keyboard depending on the extent of an individual customer's issues.

links.title: Apple disputes claims of iOS 'vulnerability' to brute force passcode hack
links.description: Apple on Saturday responded to reports suggesting a security researcher had discovered a simple to execute bypass to iOS passcode protections, saying the supposed vulnerability is in fact the result of erroneous testing. On Friday, security researcher Matthew Hickey detailed a method of bypassing iPhone's built-in countermeasures to brute force passcode hacks.
